section.title: Example for data binding usage
section.para: Layout files which supports data binding start with a _layout_ root tag followed by a _data_ element and a _view_ root element. This view element is what your root would be in a non-binding layout file. The data elements describe data which is available for binding, expressions within the layout are written in the attribute properties using the “@{}” syntax.
